Summer Camp

Paly Robotics Summer Camp 2016 is done for the year. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at: summercamp[at]palyrobotics[dot]com.

Build

At build camp students get to build robots.

Programming

At programming camp students get to program robots.

Design

At design camp students explore CAD and create models for robots.

Web/Entrepreneurship

At entrepreneurship and web design camps students pitch their ideas for a robot and then create a website for it.

Art/Animation

At art and animation campers create animations using Autodesk Maya.
